original_text: So the three brave soldiers fought through the Philistine camp and they reached Bethlehem's gate. They took some water from the well there and they carried it back to David. But he refused to drink it. He poured it on the ground as an offering to the Lord.
korean_text: 세 용사가 블레셋 사람의 진영을 돌파하고 지나가서 베들레헴 성문 곁 우물 물을 길어 가지고 다윗에게로 왔으나 다윗이 마시기를 기뻐하지 아니하고 그 물을 여호와께 부어 드리며

sentences.original_text: So the three brave soldiers fought through the Philistine camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 세 명의 용감한 병사들이 블레셋 진영을 뚫고 싸웠고

sentences.original_text: They took some water from the well there
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그곳 우물에서 물을 조금 떠서

sentences.original_text: and they carried it back to David
But he refused to drink it
He poured it on the ground
